name: bodyslam
story:
Female wrestling starring some legit Japanese Joshi  (Japanese female pro wrestling) legends such as Dump Matsumoto (whose ring name is also part of the game's name in Japan), Lioness Asuka, Chigusa Nagayo, etc.

This game also got a home port to the Master System under the generic name of Pro Wrestling, only on that version the real wrestlers are changed to made up characters, and they are turned into males.
